722861f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - Payson Street
722861f-a.text:
1815 and 1825 Riverside Drive, north side, from Payson Street (left)
to Seaman Ave. (right), showing two apartment houses, the Inwood Arms and
the Dyckman Arms occupying this entire block front. Photographers vantage
point is in Fort Tryon Park, which at this point forms the south side of
the Drive. Note that this thoroughfare is in an eastward and westward
direction here.
About 1928. s
